text:
Synple | Software Engineer (Clojure) | Amsterdam / Breda, The Netherlands | ONSITE

https://synple.eu/en/index/

Hi all, at Synple our team of seasoned Clojure developers is looking for adding a couple new team members. We are a small, well funded startup in the logistic sector with a strong technology focus and a friendly and open workplace. Our offices are in Amsterdam and Breda (The Netherlands). Our tech stack includes:

- clojure - reactjs - kafka - aws lambdas

If you know or would like to work with Clojure, have an interest in dev, devops or machine learning we would like to talk with you!
